Package cdx.opencdx.commons.collections

Class ListUtils

java.lang.Object
cdx.opencdx.commons.collections.ListUtils
public class ListUtils extends Object
Utility Class for working with Java Lists.

Public Domain open source code, taken from ... added to this project by original author.

      public static <E> List<E> unique(List<E> a, List<E> b)
      Create a list of the unique elements in both Lists.
      Type Parameters:
      E - Type used in lists, which must have overridden equals();
      Parameters:
      a - List A
      b - List B
      Returns:
      List that contains the unique elements not shared between lists.

      Type Parameters:
      E - Type of Elements
      Parameters:
      list - List to paginate
      pageSize - Number of elements per page
      page - The Page to return
      Returns:

      Filter out elements based on Predicate. Simplified method to stream filter.
      Type Parameters:
      E - Type of Elements
      Parameters:
      list - List to filter
      predicate - Predicate to indicate whether to remove of keep elements in the list
      Returns:
      List containing the elements after the filter.
